website_summaries.verdict: Yamaha's high-end quality is evident in every aspect of this set, from the solid, easy-to-install unit to the exceptional sound.
pros: Magnetic grilles are well made and easy to remove/replace
Mounting system clamps and grips make installation easy and secure
cons: A few owners say the sound could be clearer in the high range and louder overall

customer_reviews.title: the home theater guy sold me some ARIA IC614 in-ceiling speakers and told me they were fantastic. They were OK but I always felt
customer_reviews.text: In my previous home, the home theater guy sold me some ARIA IC614 in-ceiling speakers and told me they were fantastic. They were OK but I always felt something was lacking. I paid around $160 per speaker back then. In my new home, I resolved to not cheap out. I decided to get the NSIC800WH 6 speaker set. Could not believe they ended up around only $100 a speaker and I would have a spare to boot. I played some music and I was absolutely shocked that these speakers could actually pump out some bass. There was some thump! Coupled with my Polk subwoofer the sound fills the room very well and is extremely cohesive. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: AoshichanX

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome speakers. Previously had Monoprice Caliber In Ceiling Speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome speakers. Previously had Monoprice Caliber In Ceiling Speakers 8 Inch Fiber 2-Way (pair) - 104104. Like the Yamaka NSIC800WH so much better. They are clearer, more crisp sounds. Both are the same installation, but the yamaha have a magnetic grill front while the Monoprice are pushed into the right spot. The NSIC800WH is about $20/speaker more then the monoprice. I think the quality of product and sound quality is about right for the difference in cost.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great! Sonos has nothing on these when paired with BT Amp.
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Make sure you have an amp powerful enough to drive these. With a weak amp they will sound like through a hole in the wall; pretty much the same as a toy bluetooth speaker you can get for 20 bucks. Changed the amp to 2x100W from Yamaha and wholey woley what a world of difference! These can pump some serious music. Do they match the RTI-A9 from Polk in my TV room, heck no....BUT in the kitchen (recent remodel) they are waaaaaay more than needed. Sonos has nothing on my setup which costs probably less than half and the Yamaha amp has build in Bluetooth for little over a hundred bucks, WIN-WIN!. Would certainly buy again/more.
customer_reviews.author: b.deren

customer_reviews.title: Not Yamaha sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good solid construction but what use that is if the sound is meh? I'm very disappointed in the sound quality. I'm used with Yamaha great sound but this does not have it. Bass is almost non existent - I do not expect great bass from a 6.5" woofer but better than a bluetooth speaker. The highs are also harsh. I also got some distortion. Not sure if the speaker is defective or not but I'm sending it back. Compared to an Infinity ERS 110DT speaker it is much worse using the same audio setup.
customer_reviews.author: Doru Nica

customer_reviews.title: Wrong for residential
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star because I returned right away as soon as I opened the box. These speakers should not be used for residential applications such as surround speakers. The wire connections in the back of the speaker is the first clue. The second clue is when I called Yamaha tech support about the connections and talked to one of the most stupidest people ever. The Amazon item description, reviews, and Q&A are mixed in with other Yamaha speakers. The 140 watt PAIR that sells for $8 more is a much much better deal. I sold and installed audio systems for many years, I know what I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as music speakers in the basement. I haven't tested them for movies or surround sound. The sound quality is great for this price point. Unless you are some kind of audio snob and are trying to intentionally diagnose the quality of sound, these will work just fine. You really wouldn't be able to tell a difference as compared to some higher end speakers. I bought a pair of more expensive ones from the local AV store and the difference is so minor that I decided to buy more of these. I'd rather spend half as much for a product that is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: They've been incredible so far and couldn't be happier. The one issue I had with one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Klipsch (loved them btw, still have my Klipsch sub though) floor standing speaks with these Yamahas for a clean look to our living room. They've been incredible so far and couldn't be happier. The one issue I had with one of the speakers was that the wire connectors was loose and had to take the whole speaker apart to get to the part that needed tightening. I'm pretty handy so it wasn't a problem at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are absolutely fantastic! I highly recommend them without hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: I think these ceiling speakers (my purpose) are absolutely fantastic! They are very easy to mount AND are very secure. (some genius unique mounting indeed!) They have wonderful magnetic grill covers to finish off an already easy install. They sound great! Now those movie scenes, like thunderstorms, are far more realistic. They complete my missing link to enable ATMOS sound with my new Yamaha RX-A860BL receiver. Highly recommended without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff4U

customer_reviews.title: buy these speakers
customer_reviews.text: love these speakers, they are used as rear surround speakers. probably a little bit of overkill. Well made and they sound beautiful. So buy with confidence. a word to yamaha, dont go down the road of building cheap recievers for the masses. you are ruining your reputation as a quality audio equipment manufacturer. the low end stuff, looks and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: OBDEWL'L. X

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as the rear channels on my 5.1 component system. They were very easy to install, clear instructions, great quality parts at the speaker connection, and easy-to-install grill system (magnetic). The sound quality is also fantastic. I also like that the tweeter can be aimed toward the listener/center of the sound space. All in all, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday music!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great pairing with my Sonos connect amps. Recently finished our basement and wanted something for decent background music and they have worked pretty nicely. There was enough travel in the clamps to clamp onto the ceiling which was 1/2" drywall and 3/4" wood planks. I also had preinstalled the Klipsch 8" speaker enclosures.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Decouto

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly poor quality next to JBL
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pairs for my ceiling. 2 JBLs and 1 pair of these. First off, these look Great. Nice formed plastic presents a clean look. Grille is magnetic and simplex works well. But the sound? It’s Very low volume wise to the JBLs which is problematic since I don’t have individual volume control. The midrange is missing. The JBLs blow these away for the same cost
customer_reviews.author: AVJoey

customer_reviews.title: True Review
customer_reviews.text: so i went ahead and purchased the ic-400 to play atmos sounds with my other speakers polk Line pro they are very good speakers, with a high quality sound. very easy to install good looking cause of size. cons they dont play loud. (only 30w) because 1 way speakers kind of missing tweeter details. they are 85 db so they dont blend with others speakers rated +3db above ill recomend this to play along but not to use for atmos for my system i replace them with polk vt60 they are not bad just not for atmos.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando O.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I can't really attest to how they are with music or the like, probably in need of a subwoofer would be ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these as height speakers for my Dolby Atmos set up (5.1.2 in a smaller room, about 3m from back wall to screen). They do the height job very admirably. They're small but cope very well with the occasional height sounds coming out of them. Sorry I can't really attest to how they are with music or the like, probably in need of a subwoofer would be my guess given I have larger speakers in other ceilings that wouldn't suffer having a subwoofer around.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive sound.
customer_reviews.text: Installed 4 of these speakers in the ceiling as part of the home theater (that I installed myself) and then watched Titanic. When the helicopter landed on the salvage ship it felt like a helicopter was landing on our roof. Impressed beyond words. Not very expensive but amazing product. Very easy to install (except for the mess cutting a dry wall ceiling makes). Thank you Yamaha and keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: A Bhola

customer_reviews.title: excellent build quality, very good sound
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised they sell these this cheap. I love that they have magnetically attached grills. I push way more wattage than they are rated for and haven't had any issues yet (crossed at 80hz) with really good sound. Replaced some older more expensive in-ceiling speakers and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: zzzzzzzzzzzx

customer_reviews.title: Encompassing secure sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my yamaha receiver. I like to keep similar brands and I think Yamaha is one of the best. Comes with the perfect template to trace on the ceiling. The hinges work great to secure itself to the drywall. Sound is tremendous, have to give it 4 stars because I was hoping they would have the ability to manually position the a tweeter. But it is an excellent product and works very well. When I play my sports video games I keep looking out my window because I literally hear voices all around me, it's a really cool feature
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers at this price, sound great without correction.
customer_reviews.text: All of my prior in-ceiling speakers have required room correction, per speaker equalization to sound decent. Currently my room correcting amp is on the fritz (thank you Onkyo HDMI board), so I am using an older amp. I was pleasantly surprised to find these sound great without room or per-speaker equalization, and blend perfectly with my moderate sub on the bottom end. I have never gone above $200 per pair for ceiling speakers. Although there may be better speakers in higher price ranges these are the best I've experienced anywhere close to this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Moderate_runner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for surround.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected and sounds larger than expected. Amazing! Rocks the stereo and directional adjustable tweeters are perfect for surround in home theater. I wouldn’t use for mains personally. I like the house to shake, but perfect for surround.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: I like em!
customer_reviews.text: I had these professionally installed so I can't talk about the ease of install, but I like the magnetic grill and adjustable tweeter. They sound find to me. I'm no audiophile so take that for what it's worth. I think these are fine for most residential home theater installations.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was bit skeptical when I bought these speakers. But took chance as they are yamaha. They were easy to install just like other speakers. There built quality is much better that other open back options (it also helps in keeping the insulation away). I installed them yesterday and was impressed with sound so far. They are not yet “broken in” but i was pleasantly surprised with the low frequency response. Overall a good speaker. At current price point its a great deal
customer_reviews.author: PVS

customer_reviews.title: good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten the 8" for my kitchen as they both take the same amount of space to install. The magnet cover on the back makes it hard to install in certain ceiling box situations,
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. Replaced JBL SP6CII’s because they had a bad crackle at loud volumes. These don’t crackle at all and the bass is pretty good. Overall i’d recomendó them if you want some solid in ceiling speakers
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably better sound quality over the 6" version which are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably better sound quality over the 6" version which are very good in their own right. Bought these to upgrade the theater room, moving the smaller ones downstairs to the living area by the kitchen. Pumped 110 watts at them without any distortion. The 6" seemed to have trouble above ~80watts but are otherwise solid and clear.
customer_reviews.author: stefano

customer_reviews.title: Good clean sound, good clean installation.
customer_reviews.text: The value conscious should consider this series of speakers. I used a pair of these as my rear surround in a 5.1 system. I love the sound (not claiming to be an "audiophile", just excited about the system) and everyone is impressed with how clean they look. The magnetic grills are super cool. Notes: They do have aimable tweeters. They do accept banana plugs. Installation is very simple. They can contact fiberglass insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D

customer_reviews.title: Great option for in ceiling speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed 14 of these throughout my house connected with Yamaha's MusicCast devices. The speakers are really solid and the connections on board are great. I especially love the bezel-free grill. I am not super into audio clarity but these sound great to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Quality speaker that looks really good
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my office and they work really well. Sound is nice, but not earth-shattering. Grill cover is very nice and installation is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Worth the premium.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for bathroom. Tried another brand as well. These are well worth the extra money. Great low volume range, decent construction and the mounting clips are a great design. They will get quite loud, but at 4” aren’t going to feel as if you’re at a rock concert. The only neutral comment is that the covers are a bit bland.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers - Buying more
customer_reviews.text: Now own 2 pairs of these and about to buy one more pair - Just waiting for the price to drop again. They are used in a whole house audio setup. The speakers are easy to install and sound great. They are low profile so they do not stick out as much as many other speakers. The front grille is held up by magnets which holds it securely in place, but at the same time it's easy to remove without bending it.
customer_reviews.author: Per

customer_reviews.title: I should say they perform so nice, I am so very impressed with the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers to work with my Denon AVR-X6300 receiver and other Martin Logan speakers. These speakers are installed as ceiling speakers for my height/ Dolby Atmos functionality. I should say they perform so nice, I am so very impressed with the quality of sound this produce. Using it as Dolby Atmos height speakers for the configuration of 7.1.4. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nandan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, good sound quality for the dollar. I'm not an audiophile but do appreciate this product for supplying good surround sound in my new home where I did not have a good setup for rear speakers. Can't speak for durability as I just installed yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: cmak20

customer_reviews.title: Decent price and sound quality works great for my whole house sound project.
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for my whole house sound system. Decent sound and easy installation for what I needed. The pricing was what sold me on these and sound quality. Comes with everything you need to install into the ceiling. Just hook up the wires, adjust the angle of the tweeter and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathrooms and other small rooms!
customer_reviews.text: Just did a total renovation to our master bathroom. Did a lot of online research to determine which speaker would work best in a wet/humid environment, and determined that the Yamaha NS-ICS600 was best suited for this particular installation. I installed it dead center in the bathroom and the sound is awesome. This is clearly the best bang for the buck speaker in this type of installation. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ric B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and are a nice deep sound. I have installed these for two home theaters and the owners are very happy with the results. Useful notes: If asked I would say that the blue is not visible when the cover is on, the covers are a nice metal mesh that easily goes on with magnets, the mounting system is a breeze to use and can handle fairly significant ceiling thicknesses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These speakers have no equal...💯
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are absolutely amazing. They hit the highest highs, and the lowest lows....and what an incredible bargain basement price!!!! These speakers sound better than ones that cost 10X as much...😲 Thank you Yamaha!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Parsely

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium sized kitchen/dining room.
customer_reviews.text: I put these in the ceiling during a kitchen renovation. Hooked up to a Yamaha micro HiFi receiver with Chromecast sitting in one of the cabinets. Great sound quality! Bass is not too bad either, no need for subwoofer. Clean and easy install!
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Best for price
customer_reviews.text: These can't be beaten for atmos speakers in this range. Very loud and clear beautiful with or without the screen on depends on how much attention you want to draw to them. But get some today as you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Quality, crisp sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear speakers. We're using them as rear speakers in a 5.1 setup in a large living room and they're having no trouble keeping up and sound nice and clear doing so
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D Solanes

customer_reviews.title: Great design, excellent natural defined sound
customer_reviews.text: Replaced older ceiling speakers. What a difference. These are smooth, linear sound, especially when accompanied with natural sound Yamaha receiver. No booming bass, no shrill treble, just natural smooth well defined sound. Very easy installation, well designed, good terminals, great baffle ceiling screen which has strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Probably Great...Not Enough Experience
customer_reviews.text: I had these installed in ceiling as replacement rears for my floor speakers. Not yet used to this new sound experience. These are probably very good speakers, I just need more time with the new experience.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound and look great. What was disappointing was how they got the address wrong for delivery and what should have been 2 day delivery took over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lguillot

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers. I needed dual channel speakers for an ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. I needed dual channel speakers for an installation where space was limited, and these performed beautifully. I also am a huge fan of the borderless grills that these Yamaha speakers feature. They attach magnetically and stay on very firmly. Sound is great, installation is a breeze and the clips that hold the speakers are stronger than in other brands I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gil B.

customer_reviews.title: Well, they are made by Yamaha... Quality
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Yamaha receivers etc... These speakers sound Great! I am only pushing 100 watts through them and they are performing flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these speakers. They are used for low volume background music in 3 small treatment rooms in a dental office. The sound is pleasant and not harsh or "tinny" at low volume. At higher volume not normally used during the business day they have very good sound for their small size. They installed very easily and have a streamlined modern appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: All-Around Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Speakers. I installed them at a funeral home and they get the job done. The sound quality is really good, maybe not as good as something high-end but really good for the money. Super easy to install and the price was great. They look sharp, I love the magnetic grills. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Muffled voices
customer_reviews.text: Tested these against several other brands of 8" ceiling speakers. Sound of voices is very muffled. The best 8" ceiling speaker was the monoprice alpha.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great sound, and looks good next to the recessed lights. They don't give much bass but I didn't expect much either. I have a powered sub already so it's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson99

customer_reviews.title: Great price/value & Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Great price. Sound is awesome and super easy to install. Should have purchased years ago.
customer_reviews.author: V. White

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Solid, powerful stereo sound from a single, easy to mount speaker. We mounted this horizontally on our wall by a monitor and it is very low profile and easily fills the room with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, great valuse speakers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as height speakers for my Dolby Atmos Setup. These are good looking speakers with great sound and very good price. Easy to install using the supplied instructions. They sound great for as ceiling speakers for dolby atmos. The aimable tweeters are a good feature and the speakers looks so good that I have not used the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Pree

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best in ceiling speakers for the price. Tweeters can be directed to primary seating position if used in 5.1 or 7.1 setup. Replaced my dipole speakers with a pair of these. Surprised at how well these matched up to my dipoles previously. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kaytee1080

customer_reviews.title: The installation directions for these speakers were very good and the enclosed template made cutting the proper sized ...
customer_reviews.text: The installation directions for these speakers were very good and the enclosed template made cutting the proper sized holes in the ceiling fairly easy. The tweeter in the center of each speaker can be angled toward listeners below for better sound and the magnetic cover is very convenient. Overall sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling Vibrations
customer_reviews.text: Just sure you build your boxes with insulation for ceiling install. And secure them to the ceiling joist. I recommend 1x6 and 1/4 inch plywood lined with felt to help absorb vibrations. Note: The 600s are not as good as the 800s in my opinion. I used 600 for the rears and 800s for the front. The sound quality is great for 5.1 surround.I used them for my ceiling speakers and a 100 watt Polk sub woofer. Blue Rays are awesome try a James Bond DVD for a test!
customer_reviews.author: bizmo44

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for an area where one wants just background music ... very easy to install :-)
customer_reviews.author: G. N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and they sound great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house that we pre-wired for built-in speakers so I had it easy. These speaker were very easy to install and look great. They are flush with the wall and sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and appearance!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound and nearly inconspicuous appearance! I had bought another speaker twice the cost and was disappointed with the sound so got this one based on reviews but with skepticism. It far exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: JenK

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these above my bar. They sound really great. I was ver pleased with the price and the value for my money. The installation was quick and easy. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strunk II

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, crisp, Yamaha speakers. I ordered 3 pairs of these. I have 5 in the ceiling in the family room and have not been disappointed. The shipping was the fastest I've ever received from any Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price, ordered an additional set for another room. Hooked with up with a recently installed Sonos system and very pleased with sound quality. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers for the money. They sound clear at reasonably loud volumes and the bass surprised me for what these speakers are. There are many better ceiling speakers out there but not you are going to pay a lot more to get a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Heard crickets,birds etc in the background of movies that i never heard in movies before. Love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding speaker
customer_reviews.text: Use as rear dolbys. Wish I'd purchased a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: aduckfan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Good low end. Easy to install. Large hole to cut however but it is a large spkr.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home theater
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are both high quality and provide great sound
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: excellent product and very well built
customer_reviews.text: it works great in the shower, and music is pumping loud (if that is what you like) --- also good clarify, and very well construction. even the clips to hold the speaker in place in the ceiling are build to last --- great product.
customer_reviews.author: SEXY SWAMI AKA BUGGA SWAMI VIDYANANDA

customer_reviews.title: They provide a good quality sound for a good price value
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha NS-IC400WH In-Ceiling Speakers, White I ordered two pairs of the 4" Yamaha speakers for our Bathrooms. They provide a good quality sound for a good price value. The other brand that I considered was Polk, however they did not offer the 4" speaker, and the 6.5" would have been an over kill for such a small room.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound with a generous amount of Bass
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound with a generous amount of Bass. Easy Installation with a solid fix from the grabbing hooks. Had them in and out of the kitchen ceiling a few times to access the cables and still fix solid. A very good product. I have them installed in a kitchen 6.5m x 6.5m connected to a Marantz Melody Maker and they are plenty powerful enough to fill the room while remaining detailed.
customer_reviews.author: MR LEE HARPHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker easy install
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t ask for a better speaker for the money. Super easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: They are more than powerful enough for the size of my media room and were very easily installed.
customer_reviews.text: I use these speakers as front left-right speaker in a 5.1 surround system in my media room on either side of a 120 inch screen. They are more than powerful enough for the size of my media room and were very easily installed.
customer_reviews.author: JayU

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of these speakers along with a a competitors brand and neither speaker met my expectation but these speakers are quite. Too quite. I purchased a Onkyo 9.2 receiver and these speakers don't do it any justice.
customer_reviews.author: Simply me

customer_reviews.title: awesome speakers, i have mine powered by a receiver
customer_reviews.text: awesome speakers, i have mine powered by a receiver, but the way things are going self powered speakers may be the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: dontusemyrealname

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add ceiling speakers to our family room. Great sound and easy install
customer_reviews.author: Al Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Lets Rock
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. I purchased them to use for AMOS sound. Easy install with the clips. Sound really awesome. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker for the money. Easy to install and they sit pretty flush with the ceiling. I found it easier to use a drill to secure the brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Strohmaier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: They sound very good, installation was smooth. Im using them as rear surround speakers.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: They look great ,work well and you can remote the magnetic grill to clean them. And that is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: These are just as advertised and they sound and look very good! Will probably buy more of these in the future for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Longfellow

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great, good value.
customer_reviews.text: The value conscious should consider this series of speakers. I used a pair of these as my front surround in a 5.1 system. I love the sound (not claiming to be an "audiophile", just excited about the system) and everyone is impressed with how clean they look. The magnetic grills are super cool. Notes: They do have aimable tweeters. They do accept banana plugs. Installation is very simple. They can contact fiberglass insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these speakers
customer_reviews.text: We finally installed our ceiling speakers in 4 different zones. We are very happy with the sound quality. Easy to install, packaged well and arrived on time. These speakers are a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my living room. Made a big difference compared to my previous speakers. Nice, clean sound. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Varela

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker sound for good price
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers the sound is great and I love it, good choise
customer_reviews.author: Hans Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speaker and probably the easiest install I've ever done.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lil’ pups!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these puppies in a bathroom soffit. Bathroom is 10x9. Sounds great! Used a Pyle mini amp. Amp is the size of a light switch and fits into a standard electrical box.
customer_reviews.author: TIM SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, inexpensive and high quality...install super easy, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Y.

customer_reviews.title: Concert Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this speaker about a few weeks ago. I installed it in my bathroom what a great investment. My bathroom and master bedroom sounds like a concert is being held there. The is clear and crisp, the bass is satisfactory, but make no doubt about it worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound significantly better than my previous setup
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile by any means, but wall mounted these speakers are more than adequate for my needs. They sound significantly better than my previous setup.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with these excellent speakers.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers retail for around $400 in Australia so I was absolutely stoked to buy them for about a third of that on Amazon (with shipping). They arrived pretty quickly and were a doddle to install in the ceiling. The sound from them is excellent - I am using them as surround speakers with a Yamaha amp and they are as full, if not better sounding than the other Yamaha speakers I have.They also look good and blend in well, especially once the magnetic covers are painted the same colour as the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Quilgy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in the den as front and rear channel speakers. The sound is great out of these.
customer_reviews.author: BuriedInTech

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, lacking a tiny bit on bass
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, lacking a tiny bit on bass, but these are great for such a small speaker. The magnetic grills are excellent, the best I have seen on any speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Used the template, then a roto-zip. Hooked up to Russ-Sound. Satisfied with the output, but certainly not equal to a large stereo system. I love the magnetic grill. No need to paint the grill but I see that could be a problem if you wanted to paint it. As with other reviewers, this was installed in a bathroom and works OK. It is about 12 inches (30.48 cm) from a single compact fluorescent light with no obvious interference. One suggestion: Since this was installed in an attic ceiling, I gently taped the cardboard template to the back of speaker to protect it from insulation. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for the price range. Used in ceiling for atmos 7.2 set up
customer_reviews.author: 3forfun

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I wish I'd used these for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I wish I'd used these for the other rooms, but the dimensions are off, so I'd have to cut new holes.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Groove

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: got these speaker and the are awesome they sound very clear. my husband install them back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Sounds very good. Be aware that it will not quite fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good. Be aware that it will not quite fit in the space made by a 2x4. You'll have to dig out a bit of the opposite drywall, as 2x4's are actually 3.5"
customer_reviews.author: C Z

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice. Good sound and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. Good sound and easy to install. I used them for home theater and they worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these speakers as rear channels so I didn't need a lot of power just a decent quality speaker that was easy to install. These are perfect. Solidly built speakers that not only were easy to install but look great as well!

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sound Good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, for a small speaker it sounds very nice. Like the way the back of the speaker is all covered and you don't have to worry about dust or other things touching the electronics. Good
customer_reviews.author: Dale Bellantoni

customer_reviews.title: The Speakers sound great and were easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The Speakers sound great and were easy to install. This is my second pair and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David E Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha NS-IC600 ceiling speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for my in-ceiling surround setup. Very easy to install, solid construction, great sound for the price. Plus these speakers are also good for bathroom and in moisture environment. Took me about 20 minutes to install each speakers. Sound is excellent (I am only using these as my rear surround) and looks great flush mounted with the magnet grills.
customer_reviews.author: BMTAN

customer_reviews.title: These sound really nice. Using as rears and driving with Rotel RSX1065
customer_reviews.text: These sound really nice.Using as rears and driving with Rotel RSX1065. I am very pleased with these speakers. The magnetic grills do not resonate either and stick well.
customer_reviews.author: MJN

product_meta.title: Yamaha NSIC800WH 140-Watts 2-Way RMS Speaker -- White (2 Speakers)
product_meta.description:
An easy-to-install in-ceiling speaker system that has magnetic grilles and high sound quality designed to meet various custom installation requirements.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



YAMAHA NS-IC800 IN-CEILING SPEAKERS: RICH STEREO SOUND ANYWHERE IN YOUR HOME
The NS-IC800 8-inch in-ceiling speaker is good for 2-channel sound reproduction or home theater use in a living room, dining room, family room or bedroom. The NS-IC800 uses a blue polypropylene mica cone woofer and fluid-cooled soft- dome swivel tweeter in a coaxial design. The tweeter swivels so it can be aimed for most effective high frequency output. The paintable grille with magnets makes it easy to attach or remove for quick installation. The large mounting clamp with non-slip tread grips ceilings or walls firmly for sure installation.



The Yamaha NS-IC800 blends seamlessly into your decor

HIGH SOUND QUALITY WITH A UNIQUE DESIGN
Yamaha's policy of always putting sound quality first, combined with decades of experience in producing fine speakers, ensures that the sound of these speakers is superior to that of many other in-ceiling speakers. The NS-IC800 uses a blue PP (polypropylene) mica cone woofer and fluid-cooled soft-dome swivel tweeter in a coaxial design. The tweeter swivels so it can be aimed for most effective high frequency output.



Magnets make it easy to attach or remove the grille

A unique ridge-shape aluminum center cap with a stepped speaker surround eliminates mid-high frequency peaks, so the sound is delivered smoothly and musically.

The NS-IC800 8-inch speaker is good for 2-channel sound reproduction or home theater use in a living room, dining room, family room or bedroom. The design of these speakers is very practical. They have a noticeable grain-finished acoustic baffle with a spiral pattern which makes the sound disperse naturally. The slim fringe grille becomes almost invisible after installation, so it won't conflict with your interior decor. A sealed back cover protects both speaker unit and crossover from dust and moisture.

QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION
The paintable grille with magnets makes it easy to attach or remove for quick installation. The large mounting clamp with non-slip tread grips ceilings or walls firmly for sure installation. No need for expensive professional installation--the NS-IC800 is an easy upgrade to bring better stereo sound into your existing home theater setup.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Speaker Type: 2-way coaxial
 * Woofer: 8" polypropylene mica cone
 * Tweeter: 1" fluid-cooled soft dome, swivel
 * Voice Coil: Single
 * Frequency Response: 50 Hz - 28 kHz
 * Impedance: 8 ohms
 * Sensitivity: 90 dB
 * Maximum Input Power: 140 watts
 * Network (Crossover Frequency): 12 dB/oct. (3.5 kHz)
 * Speaker Terminals: Gold-plated, push type
 * Grille: Thin, slim-fringe with magnet catch
 * Dimensions: 10-7/8" x 4-1/4" (Diameter x Depth)
 * Mounting Depth: 4-1/4"
 * Weight: 4.2 lbs
 * Package: Pair.
feature_bullets: Crossover Type-2-way; Maximum Frequency Response-28 kHz; Physical Characteristics-Color-White
Input Power (Maximum / Nominal): 140W / 50W; Impedance-8 Ohm; Physical Characteristics-Depth-4.3
Driver Type-Dome; Crossover Frequency-3.50 kHz; Physical Characteristics-Diameter-10.9
Slim profile design for flush in-celing or wall mounting
Sealed back cover protects against dust and moisture
Paintable grill and large mounting clamp
Polypropylene mica cone woofer for high-performance mid/low sound reproduction
Grain-finished acoustic baffle with spiral pattern for natural sound dispersion
